Class Animal

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
p4_group_8_repo.Actor
p4_group_8_repo.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Animal
extends Actor
Represents the main character in the gameplay.
Author:
Liew Yih Seng
